tasks.title: Setup Next.js Project
tasks.description: Initialize the Next.js project with necessary configurations.
tasks.details: Use Next.js 14.2 to create a new project. Set up TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and Shadcn/ui for styling. Ensure the project is hosted on Vercel.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify project setup by running the development server and checking for any errors.

subtasks.title: Initialize Next.js Project
subtasks.description: Create a new Next.js project using version 14.2.
subtasks.details: Run 'npx create-next-app@14.2' to initialize the project.
subtasks.testStrategy: Run the development server to ensure no errors.

subtasks.title: Set Up TypeScript
subtasks.description: Configure TypeScript in the Next.js project.
subtasks.details: Install TypeScript and necessary types using 'npm install --save-dev typescript @types/react'.
subtasks.testStrategy: Check for TypeScript errors by running 'tsc'.

subtasks.title: Integrate Tailwind CSS
subtasks.description: Add Tailwind CSS for styling the project.
subtasks.details: Install Tailwind CSS and configure it by creating 'tailwind.config.js'.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify Tailwind styles by adding a test component.

subtasks.title: Install Shadcn/ui
subtasks.description: Set up Shadcn/ui for additional UI components.
subtasks.details: Install Shadcn/ui and configure it within the project.
subtasks.testStrategy: Render a Shadcn/ui component to ensure proper setup.

subtasks.title: Deploy to Vercel
subtasks.description: Host the Next.js project on Vercel.
subtasks.details: Connect the project to a Vercel account and deploy.
subtasks.testStrategy: Access the deployed site to ensure it is live and error-free.

tasks.title: Integrate Authentication with Clerk
tasks.details: Integrate Clerk for user authentication. Set up sign-up, login, and logout functionalities. Ensure secure handling of user sessions.
tasks.testStrategy: Test authentication flows by creating test accounts and verifying login/logout processes.

subtasks.title: Set Up Clerk Account and Configure API Keys
subtasks.description: Create a Clerk account and configure API keys for integration.
subtasks.details: Sign up for a Clerk account and obtain the necessary API keys. Configure these keys in the development environment to enable authentication services.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify API key configuration by checking connection status.

subtasks.title: Implement User Sign-Up Functionality
subtasks.description: Develop the user sign-up feature using Clerk.
subtasks.details: Use Clerk's SDK to implement the sign-up process. Ensure the form captures necessary user information and handles errors gracefully.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test sign-up with various inputs to ensure proper validation and error handling.

subtasks.title: Develop User Login and Logout Features
subtasks.description: Create login and logout functionalities using Clerk.
subtasks.details: Utilize Clerk's SDK to implement login and logout. Ensure secure session management and user feedback on login status.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test login/logout flows with valid and invalid credentials to ensure security and usability.

subtasks.title: Secure User Sessions
subtasks.description: Implement secure session handling for authenticated users.
subtasks.details: Configure Clerk to manage user sessions securely. Implement session timeout and renewal strategies to enhance security.
subtasks.testStrategy: Simulate session expiration and renewal to verify security measures.

subtasks.title: Integrate Authentication UI Components
subtasks.description: Add and style UI components for authentication using Clerk.
subtasks.details: Design and integrate UI components for sign-up, login, and logout. Ensure they are responsive and user-friendly.
subtasks.testStrategy: Conduct UI testing to ensure components render correctly across devices.

tasks.title: Implement Payment System with Stripe
tasks.description: Set up payment processing using Stripe.
tasks.details: Integrate Stripe for handling payments. Implement subscription management and ensure secure transaction processing.
tasks.testStrategy: Perform test transactions using Stripe's test mode to ensure payment flows work correctly.

subtasks.title: Set Up Stripe Account and API Keys
subtasks.description: Create a Stripe account and obtain API keys for integration.
subtasks.details: Sign up for a Stripe account and generate the necessary API keys for development and production environments.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify API key access by making a test API call.

subtasks.title: Integrate Stripe Payment Gateway
subtasks.description: Implement the Stripe payment gateway into the application.
subtasks.details: Use Stripe's SDK to integrate the payment gateway, allowing users to make payments securely.
subtasks.testStrategy: Perform test transactions using Stripe's test mode to ensure payment processing works.

subtasks.title: Implement Subscription Management
subtasks.description: Set up subscription plans and management using Stripe.
subtasks.details: Define subscription plans in Stripe and integrate subscription management features into the application.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test subscription creation, updates, and cancellations in test mode.

subtasks.title: Ensure Secure Transaction Processing
subtasks.description: Implement security measures for transaction processing.
subtasks.details: Use Stripe's security features like webhooks and tokenization to ensure secure transactions.
subtasks.testStrategy: Conduct security audits and test webhook handling.

subtasks.title: Develop User Interface for Payment and Subscription
subtasks.description: Create a user-friendly interface for payment and subscription management.
subtasks.details: Design and implement UI components for users to manage payments and subscriptions easily.
subtasks.testStrategy: User testing to ensure the interface is intuitive and functional.

tasks.title: Develop Project Selection and Onboarding UI
tasks.description: Create the UI for project selection and onboarding.
tasks.details: Design and implement the UI for selecting project types and technology stacks. Use Tailwind CSS for styling and ensure responsiveness.
tasks.testStrategy: Conduct user testing to ensure the UI is intuitive and responsive across devices.

subtasks.title: Design Project Selection UI
subtasks.description: Create wireframes for the project selection interface.
subtasks.details: Use design tools to create wireframes focusing on user flow and layout.
subtasks.testStrategy: Review wireframes with stakeholders for feedback.

subtasks.title: Implement Project Selection UI
subtasks.description: Develop the UI for project selection using Tailwind CSS.
subtasks.details: Translate wireframes into code using React and Tailwind CSS for styling.
subtasks.testStrategy: Conduct cross-browser testing to ensure consistent appearance.

subtasks.title: Design Onboarding UI
subtasks.description: Create wireframes for the onboarding process.
subtasks.details: Focus on user experience and clarity in the onboarding steps.
subtasks.testStrategy: Gather feedback from potential users on the wireframes.

subtasks.title: Implement Onboarding UI
subtasks.description: Develop the onboarding interface using Tailwind CSS.
subtasks.details: Use React and Tailwind CSS to build a responsive onboarding UI.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test responsiveness on various devices and screen sizes.

subtasks.title: Integrate Project and Onboarding UI
subtasks.description: Ensure seamless integration between project selection and onboarding.
subtasks.details: Connect the project selection and onboarding components to provide a smooth user experience.
subtasks.testStrategy: Conduct user testing to ensure intuitive navigation between components.

tasks.title: Implement Natural Language Search with Algolia
tasks.description: Set up Algolia for natural language search functionality.
tasks.details: Integrate Algolia to enable natural language search across documents, tutorials, and snippets. Configure indexing and search relevance.
tasks.testStrategy: Test search functionality with various queries to ensure accurate and relevant results.

subtasks.title: Set Up Algolia Account and API Key
subtasks.description: Create an Algolia account and obtain the API key for integration.
subtasks.details: Sign up for Algolia and generate the necessary API keys to enable integration with the application.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify API key access by making a test request.

subtasks.title: Integrate Algolia SDK into Application
subtasks.description: Add Algolia SDK to the application for search functionality.
subtasks.details: Install the Algolia SDK using npm and configure it within the application to prepare for indexing and search operations.
subtasks.testStrategy: Ensure the SDK is correctly installed and initialized by checking console logs.

subtasks.title: Configure Indexing for Documents, Tutorials, and Snippets
subtasks.description: Set up indexing for various content types in Algolia.
subtasks.details: Define the schema and configure indexing settings for documents, tutorials, and snippets to ensure they are searchable.
subtasks.testStrategy: Perform indexing and verify data is correctly stored in Algolia.

subtasks.title: Implement Natural Language Search Queries
subtasks.description: Develop search queries to handle natural language input.
subtasks.details: Write search queries that leverage Algolia's natural language processing capabilities to return relevant results.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test search queries with different natural language inputs to ensure relevance.

subtasks.title: Optimize Search Relevance and Performance
subtasks.description: Fine-tune search relevance and performance settings in Algolia.
subtasks.details: Adjust ranking and relevance settings in Algolia to improve search result accuracy and performance.
subtasks.testStrategy: Conduct performance tests and analyze search result accuracy with various queries.

tasks.title: Develop Content Management System for Docs, Tutorials, and Snippets
tasks.description: Create a system to manage and render content.
tasks.details: Implement MDX rendering for documents, tutorials, and snippets. Ensure content is easily editable and supports interactive elements.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify content rendering by adding sample documents and checking for correct display and functionality.

subtasks.title: Set Up MDX Rendering Environment
subtasks.description: Configure the development environment to support MDX rendering.
subtasks.details: Install necessary libraries and configure the build system to handle MDX files.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify MDX files are correctly processed and rendered.

subtasks.title: Develop Content Structure for Documents
subtasks.description: Create a structure for managing document content.
subtasks.details: Design a schema for documents and implement a system to manage them.
subtasks.testStrategy: Add sample documents and ensure they are displayed correctly.

subtasks.title: Implement Interactive Elements Support
subtasks.description: Enable support for interactive elements within content.
subtasks.details: Integrate libraries or frameworks that allow interactive components in MDX.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test with interactive components to ensure functionality.

subtasks.title: Create Editing Interface for Content
subtasks.description: Develop an interface for editing documents, tutorials, and snippets.
subtasks.details: Design and implement a user-friendly editing interface with live preview.
subtasks.testStrategy: Conduct user testing to ensure ease of use and functionality.

subtasks.title: Test Content Management System
subtasks.description: Perform comprehensive testing of the entire content management system.
subtasks.details: Test all functionalities including rendering, editing, and interactive elements.
subtasks.testStrategy: Use a variety of test cases to ensure all features work as expected.

tasks.title: Implement Real-Time Success Metrics and Error Diagnostics
tasks.description: Add features for displaying success metrics and diagnosing errors.
tasks.details: Develop components to display real-time success metrics and integrate basic error diagnostics. Use PostHog for analytics and Sentry for error tracking.
tasks.testStrategy: Simulate user interactions to ensure metrics update in real-time and error diagnostics provide accurate feedback.

subtasks.title: Set Up PostHog for Success Metrics
subtasks.description: Integrate PostHog to track and display real-time success metrics.
subtasks.details: Install and configure PostHog SDK in the application. Set up event tracking for key success metrics such as user engagement and feature usage.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify metrics update in real-time by simulating user interactions.

subtasks.title: Integrate Sentry for Error Tracking
subtasks.description: Add Sentry to capture and report application errors.
subtasks.details: Install Sentry SDK and configure it to capture errors and exceptions. Ensure it reports to the Sentry dashboard for monitoring.
subtasks.testStrategy: Trigger known errors to ensure they are captured and reported accurately.

subtasks.title: Develop Real-Time Metrics Dashboard
subtasks.description: Create a dashboard to display real-time success metrics using PostHog data.
subtasks.details: Design and implement a user interface to visualize success metrics. Use charts and graphs to represent data effectively.
subtasks.testStrategy: Check dashboard updates in real-time with simulated data.

subtasks.title: Implement Error Diagnostics UI
subtasks.description: Develop a user interface for displaying error diagnostics using Sentry data.
subtasks.details: Create a UI component to list and detail errors captured by Sentry. Include filtering and sorting capabilities.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test UI with various error scenarios to ensure accurate display and functionality.

subtasks.title: Conduct End-to-End Testing
subtasks.description: Perform end-to-end testing of success metrics and error diagnostics features.
subtasks.details: Simulate user interactions and error scenarios to ensure all components work together seamlessly. Validate data accuracy and UI responsiveness.
subtasks.testStrategy: Run comprehensive tests covering all user interactions and error cases.

tasks.title: Create Feedback and Quiz System
tasks.description: Implement a system for user feedback and quizzes.
tasks.details: Develop a feedback collection system and integrate quizzes at checkpoints in tutorials. Ensure data is stored securely.
tasks.testStrategy: Conduct user testing to ensure feedback is collected correctly and quizzes function as intended.

subtasks.title: Design Feedback Collection Interface
subtasks.description: Create the user interface for collecting feedback.
subtasks.details: Design a simple, user-friendly interface for feedback collection using Tailwind CSS.
subtasks.testStrategy: Conduct user testing to ensure ease of use.

subtasks.title: Implement Feedback Storage System
subtasks.description: Develop a secure system to store user feedback.
subtasks.details: Use a database to securely store feedback data, ensuring compliance with data protection regulations.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify data is stored securely and can be retrieved accurately.

subtasks.title: Design Quiz Interface for Tutorials
subtasks.description: Create the UI for quizzes at tutorial checkpoints.
subtasks.details: Design an interactive quiz interface using Tailwind CSS, ensuring it integrates seamlessly with tutorials.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test the interface for usability and integration with tutorials.

subtasks.title: Develop Quiz Logic and Scoring System
subtasks.description: Implement the backend logic for quizzes, including scoring.
subtasks.details: Create backend logic to handle quiz questions, answers, and scoring. Ensure scalability and reliability.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test the logic with various question types and scoring scenarios.

subtasks.title: Integrate Feedback and Quiz Systems
subtasks.description: Combine feedback and quiz systems into the main application.
subtasks.details: Ensure both systems work together seamlessly and are integrated into the main application flow.
subtasks.testStrategy: Conduct end-to-end testing to ensure both systems function correctly together.

tasks.title: Set Up Infrastructure and Deployment
tasks.details: Set up Vercel for hosting, configure Supabase for database and storage, and ensure all services are correctly linked and deployed.
tasks.testStrategy: Deploy the application to a staging environment and verify all services are operational.

subtasks.title: Set Up Vercel Hosting
subtasks.description: Configure Vercel for hosting the application.
subtasks.details: Create a Vercel account and set up a new project for hosting. Link the GitHub repository to Vercel for automatic deployments.
subtasks.testStrategy: Deploy a sample app to verify hosting setup.

subtasks.title: Configure Supabase Database
subtasks.description: Set up Supabase for database management.
subtasks.details: Create a Supabase account and set up a new database instance. Configure the database schema and tables as per project requirements.
subtasks.testStrategy: Connect to the database and perform CRUD operations to ensure functionality.

subtasks.title: Set Up Supabase Storage
subtasks.description: Configure Supabase for file storage needs.
subtasks.details: Enable storage in Supabase and configure buckets for storing application files. Set appropriate permissions for access.
subtasks.testStrategy: Upload and retrieve files to test storage functionality.

subtasks.title: Link Vercel and Supabase
subtasks.description: Ensure Vercel and Supabase are correctly linked.
subtasks.details: Configure environment variables in Vercel to connect with Supabase. Ensure API keys and database URLs are correctly set.
subtasks.testStrategy: Deploy the app and verify database connectivity from the Vercel-hosted environment.

subtasks.title: Deploy to Staging Environment
subtasks.description: Deploy the application to a staging environment for testing.
subtasks.details: Set up a staging environment in Vercel. Deploy the application and ensure all services are operational.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify the application functionality in the staging environment and check for any issues.

tasks.title: Conduct Beta Testing and Gather Feedback
tasks.description: Launch a beta version for early access users.
tasks.details: Invite 100 early access users to test the platform. Collect feedback and identify bugs for improvement before the official launch.
tasks.testStrategy: Analyze user feedback and bug reports to prioritize fixes and enhancements for the official launch.

subtasks.title: Prepare Beta Version for Deployment
subtasks.description: Ensure the beta version is ready for deployment to early access users.
subtasks.details: Finalize all features and perform internal testing to ensure stability before inviting users.
subtasks.testStrategy: Conduct internal testing to verify stability.

subtasks.title: Invite Early Access Users
subtasks.description: Send invitations to 100 selected early access users.
subtasks.details: Compile a list of early access users and send out invitations via email with access instructions.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify that all users receive invitations and can access the platform.

subtasks.title: Monitor User Activity and Collect Feedback
subtasks.description: Track user activity and gather feedback during the beta testing phase.
subtasks.details: Set up analytics to monitor user interactions and provide a feedback form for users to submit their experiences.
subtasks.testStrategy: Ensure feedback form is accessible and analytics are tracking correctly.

subtasks.title: Identify and Document Bugs
subtasks.description: Collect and document any bugs reported by users during beta testing.
subtasks.details: Review user feedback and analytics to identify bugs. Document these issues for the development team.
subtasks.testStrategy: Cross-reference user reports with analytics data to confirm bugs.

subtasks.title: Analyze Feedback and Prioritize Improvements
subtasks.description: Analyze user feedback and prioritize necessary improvements before the official launch.
subtasks.details: Evaluate feedback and bug reports to determine priority fixes and enhancements. Plan updates accordingly.
subtasks.testStrategy: Review feedback analysis to ensure all critical issues are addressed.

tasks.title: Implement Payment System with Toss Payments (Korea)
tasks.description: Set up payment processing using Toss Payments for Korean domestic users. This will be the primary payment system for Korean market before global expansion.
tasks.details: Integrate Toss Payments SDK for handling payments in Korea. Implement one-time payments and subscription (billing) management. Support all Korean payment methods including credit cards, Kakao Pay, Naver Pay, Toss Pay, and bank transfers. Design the system to coexist with Stripe for future global expansion.
tasks.testStrategy: Perform test transactions using Toss Payments test mode (sandbox) to ensure all payment flows work correctly. Test with various Korean payment methods.

subtasks.title: Set Up Toss Payments Account and Configure API Keys
subtasks.description: Create a Toss Payments developer account and configure API keys for integration.
subtasks.details: Register at https://developers.tosspayments.com and obtain test Client Key and Secret Key. Store keys securely in environment variables.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify API key access by making a test API call to Toss Payments sandbox.

subtasks.title: Integrate Toss Payments SDK and Client Setup
subtasks.description: Install and configure the Toss Payments JavaScript SDK in the Next.js application.
subtasks.details: Install @tosspayments/payment-sdk package. Create lib/toss-payments.ts client configuration. Set up environment variables for test and production modes.
subtasks.testStrategy: Run SDK initialization tests to confirm successful integration.

subtasks.title: Implement One-Time Payment Checkout
subtasks.description: Develop the one-time payment checkout process for single content purchases.
subtasks.details: Create /api/toss/checkout route to initiate payments. Implement payment widget with support for cards, Kakao Pay, Naver Pay, Toss Pay. Handle payment request with orderId, amount, and orderName.
subtasks.testStrategy: Perform test transactions using Toss Payments sandbox to validate checkout flow.

subtasks.title: Develop Payment Confirmation API
subtasks.description: Implement server-side payment confirmation/approval API endpoint.
subtasks.details: Create /api/toss/confirm route to verify and approve payments using paymentKey. Implement idempotency handling. Update database with payment records on success.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test API with various payment scenarios including success, failure, and timeout cases.

subtasks.title: Create Webhook Handler for Payment Events
subtasks.description: Set up webhook endpoint to receive and process payment status updates from Toss Payments.
subtasks.details: Create /api/toss/webhook route. Handle events: DONE, CANCELED, PARTIAL_CANCELED, ABORTED, EXPIRED. Verify webhook signature for security. Update subscription and purchase records accordingly.
subtasks.testStrategy: Simulate webhook events in sandbox environment to verify handler functionality.

subtasks.title: Implement Subscription Billing for Recurring Payments
subtasks.description: Develop subscription billing management using Toss Payments Billing feature.
subtasks.details: Implement billing key issuance for recurring payments. Create subscription management: create, update, cancel. Handle automatic billing on renewal dates. Support Pro ($15,000/month) and Team ($65,000/month) plans.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test subscription lifecycle: creation, renewal, cancellation in sandbox.

subtasks.title: Develop Payment UI Components
subtasks.description: Create user-friendly payment UI components integrated with Toss Payments.
subtasks.details: Build PaymentModal component with plan selection. Implement TossPaymentWidget wrapper. Add loading states, error handling, and success feedback. Ensure mobile-responsive design with Korean localization.
subtasks.testStrategy: Conduct UI testing across devices and browsers. Test all payment method selections.

subtasks.title: Update Database Schema for Toss Payment Records
subtasks.description: Extend Supabase database schema to support Toss Payments alongside Stripe.
subtasks.details: Add columns: toss_payment_key, toss_order_id, toss_billing_key to purchases and subscriptions tables. Create payment_provider enum (stripe, toss). Ensure backward compatibility with existing Stripe data.
subtasks.testStrategy: Run migration and verify data integrity. Test CRUD operations with new schema.
